Twister


*Twister nods to Sinesis and looks at Dracona and Plintissa*

  -=
---- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  S=
ent: Friday, August 04, 2000 11:23 PM
  Subject: Re: NBW


  "No, no interf=
ering, we just have to watch them. We attack whomever survives." Sinesis sa=
ys. He meant it...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: iloveallliza=
rds 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 11:12 PM=

    Subject: Re: NBW


    Twister


    *Twister follows Sinesis and look=
s at Plintissa and Dracona*

    Twister: Woah, looks like a battle. Is it =
a death fight? Or maybe a retreat fight where the first to retreat loses?

=
    *Twister asks Sinesis*

    Twister: I don't think we should interfear =
or anything and find our own pray. What do you think?

    *Twister says to=
 Sinesis*

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 10:09 PM
      S=
ubject: Re: NBW


      Sinesis shrugs.

      "Let's just go out scouting.=
" Sinesis says. He posed and put Sinister's sword away. Then he walked out =
the door and noticed the battle about to take place between Plintissa and D=
racona...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizar=
ds 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 9=
:56 PM
        Subject: Re: NBW


        Twister


        Twister: Okay, =
let's ask her. Over Commlink or face to face?

        *Twister asks Sinesi=
s*

          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
      =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 9:37 PM=

          Subject: Re: NBW


          "Maybe, how about we ask Dracona?" =
Sinesis says to Twister...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
      From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          =
  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 6:02 PM
            Subject: Re: NBW


    =
        Twister

            *Twister smiles as Sinesis shakes her hand*

 =
           Twister: Do you know of anyone that would like to die?

        =
    *Twister asks Sinesis*

              ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
           From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
           =
   Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:52 PM
              Subject: Re: NBW


 =
             Sinesis eagerly shakes Twister's hand.

              "Partner=
s!" Sinesis says...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
         =
       From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
     =
           Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:40 PM
                Subject: R=
e: NBW


                Twister


                *Twister looks at Sinesi=
s*

                Twister: It seems that we have something in common and =
I need a partner too.

                *Twister extends her hand to Sinesis=
*

                Twister: Partner?

                *Twister asks Sinesis=
 with her hand extended*

                  ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
                 From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
                 Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:45 PM
                  Su=
bject: Re: NBW


                  "Traveling alone, though? What about all=
 the bots we killed together? What about all of the times we took shots for=
 each other? It's horribly not fair. I wish I had a partner still." Sinesis=
 said. He looked closer at Twister.

                  "Hey, will you be my=
 partner?" Sinesis askes Twister...
                    ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
                    From: ilovealllizards 
                    T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:=
38 AM
                    Subject: Re: NBW


                    Twister/Bl=
izzard/Infectra



                    *Twister looks at the sword and sigh=
s*

                    Twister: I'll have to get used to the fact that, my=
 sister has a life too and I'll have to learn to travel alone....

        =
            *Twister sighs and slowly and gentley places the energon eagles=
 into her arm compartment*


                    *Blizzard looks at Siniste=
r and smiles*

                    Blizzard: I wonder what's happening back=
 at the base.



                    *Infectra smiles back at Airbomber*

 =
                   Infectra: I trust the both of you......I did trust the o=
thers but....

                    *Infectra sighs*

                    In=
fectra: I need to stop thinking of things that upset me. But, it's hard to =
thinl of the good times because there were hardly none.

                  =
  *Infectra says to Airbomber and grins*


                      ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
                      From: THECODE 
                  =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Friday, August 04, =
2000 4:20 AM
                      Subject: Re: NBW


                     =
 Sinesis frowns. He holds up his brothers sword.

                      "He=
 left this here, without it, what shall he do? We have simular problems. I =
just wish I still had him by my side." Sinesis said to Twister.

          =
            Sinister held Blizzards hand, illegal fireworks shooting off in=
 his eyes.

                      Stranato calls out.

                    =
  "Hey, any Maximals here?" He yells through the base. Airbomber sits down =
and looks to Infectra. He smiles.

                      "Hopefully, the Ma=
ximals will listen to us, they must know of the occurences happening. I tru=
st Stranato, he's always been good. Well, maybe he hasn't always been good,=
 but he's good now." Airbomber said to Infectra. He laughed at his words...=

                        ----- Original Message ----- 
                    =
    From: ilovealllizards 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
                        Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 11:44 PM
          =
              Subject: Re: NBW


                        Twister/Blizzard/I=
nfectra



                        *Twister looks at Sinesis*

            =
            Twister: I've decided to let my sister be...For she's my sister=
 and I love her too much to pull her away from the she loves....

         =
               *Twister opens her arm compartment and pulls out a two small=
 pieces of energon both shaped like an eagle*

                        Twis=
ter: Our parents gave us both one to unite us as sisters and friends foreve=
r and always help each other. I found Blizzard's on the ground in front of =
the base. I doubt she dropped it by accident.....

                        =
*Twister holds out to Sinesis so he can see*



                        (OO=
C: Ack! I meant The Team Ultima Base! My bad, Sorry.)

                    =
    *Blizzard skips out of the cave and walks next to Sinister for The Team=
 Ultima Base and holds her hand out wanting Sinister to hold her hand*



 =
                       *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber into the Ma=
ximal Base*


                          ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
                     From: THECODE 
                          To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
                          Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:59 P=
M
                          Subject: Re: NBW


                          Si=
nesis sighs and stares at Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

                =
          Sinister frowns when he sees Blizar walking toward the Maximal ba=
se.

                          "Where are you going? And can I come?" Sinis=
ter asked.

                          Stranato and Airbomber stop at the Ma=
ximal base, since they were never set on enemy and never betrayed the Maxim=
als, they went on in...
                            ----- Original Message =
----- 
                            From: ilovealllizards 
                 =
           To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                            Sent: Thursd=
ay, August 03, 2000 6:46 PM
                            Subject: Re: NBW


=
                            Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Twister


             =
               *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber towards the Maximal=
 Base*



                            *Wrath gets into a CR Chamber when he=
 arives at the Maximal Base awaits his repairs*



                        =
    *Blizzard does a little skip out of the cave walks next to Sinister for=
 the Maximal Base and holds her hand out towards his wanting to hold hands =
with him*



                            (OOC: Twister is out near the Maxi=
mal Base but I'm making her come back anyway.)

                           =
 *Twister leaves the location of the Maximal Base seeing as how everyone wa=
s else where and went back to Team Ultimas Base and sits at the same table =
as Sinesis*

                            Twister: I don't know what I'm goi=
ng to do....I end up here thinking I'll find a nice Team where I'm wanted a=
nd me and my sister could be sisters and friends...I was such a fool for be=
lieving such happiness could happen.....

                            *Twis=
ter puts her double sided sword away stares at the table*


               =
               ----- Original Message ----- 
                              =
From: THECODE 
                              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
                        Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
           =
                   Subject: NBW


                              Stranato an=
d Airbomber walked toward the Maximal base.

                              =
Gangon, still dying.

                              Deemos and Inzola confr=
ont one another several times, but Inzola always runs from Deemos.

       =
                       Etchingar called out to Megatron.

                 =
             "Hey, do I got the job?" He asked.

                          =
    Time Bomb waited patiently and Land Mine was healed now. Land Mine look=
ed around, looking to meet Megatron.

                              Siniste=
r came out of the cave (Hopefully with Blizzard.) and started back toward T=
eam Ultima's base.

                              Sinesis was healed and sa=
t down next to Twister...
